headline: Cruise line stocks fall amid concerns over promotional activity
summary: Investing.com -- Carnival Corporation (NYSE:CCL) stock fell 3.2% on Friday, leading a broader decline in cruise line shares amid growing concerns about increased promotional activity in the sector. Royal Caribbean Cruises (NYSE:RCL) dropped 2.7%, Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NYSE:NCLH) declined 1.7%, and Viking Holdings (NYSE:VIK) slipped 2.5%.
